t: Why Is My Amazon Listing Not Showing Up? (In Search Results) - Brand Builder University
s: May 3, 2024 - To create a new listing on Amazon, head to Seller Central, then head to Catalog > Add Products. If you’re reselling another brand, search to see if a listing already exists and if so, add your inventory to the existing listing. If you’re selling your own branded products, choose the option ...

t: Brand Name missing from Title : r/FulfillmentByAmazon
s: April 24, 2024 - This is an internal experiment that Amazon is running for certain brands. They claim that it increases conversions or some other BS metric that is responsible for this type of title omission. It’s incredibly difficult to have Amazon revert back to having a brand-name display in the title.

t: How long does it take for an Amazon listing to appear?
Amazon
s: Did you put your brandname in your title?

t: Brand Name Missing from All Product Listings
s: I have documented this issue with screenshots and openeda few support cases over the months, including the latest Case ID: 16482478411, but have not received a resolution. This inconsistency in brand name display is affecting my product visibility and sales.

t: Missing attributes brand / Missing attributes manufacturer - Module Amazon Marketplace
s: January 2, 2015 - On Amazon Brand / Manufacturer field (depending on the category) is mandatory. On Prestashop the field Manufacturer / brand changes its name according to the version, on Prestashop 1.6 it is the Manufacturer field and on Prestashop 1.5 it is the field Brand!

t: My new listings are missing the description and key features, please help
s: Hi, I’m new to Amazon and trying to list an item has been an absolute nightmare. I’ve tried several times and not succeeded to create a listing where it just works. I follow the recommended steps, have registered my brand, and fill in the relevant info including pictures, descriptions and keywords. Initially everything looks fine, a day later, the key features or description is missing ...
